data.eml:eml: The ant genus Tetramorium Mayr in the Afrotropical region (Hymenoptera, Formicidae, Myrmicinae): synonymisation of Decamorium Forel under Tetramorium, and taxonomic revision of the T. decem species group

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hita Garcia, Francisco, Fisher, Brian L. (2014): The ant genus Tetramorium Mayr in the Afrotropical region (Hymenoptera, Formicidae, Myrmicinae): synonymisation of Decamorium Forel under Tetramorium, and taxonomic revision of the T. decem species group. ZooKeys 411: 67-103, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.411.7260, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.411.7260
